member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported
member.summary: Specifies options to handle situation when registered service is already present in the registry.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.AppendNotKeyed
member.summary: Appends new default registration or throws registration with the same key.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Throw
member.summary: Throws if default or registration with the same key is already exist.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Keep
member.summary: Keeps old default or keyed registration ignoring new registration: ensures Register-Once semantics.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.IfAlreadyExported.Replace
member.summary: Replaces old registration with new one.

member.summary: Per name.

member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that exported service is decorator of services of .

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.ContractName
member.summary: If specified, it has more priority over .

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.ContractKey
member.summary: Contract key of Decorated type, not for a decorator itself. Used to find the service to apply decorator to.

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.Order
member.summary: If provided specifies relative decorator position in decorators chain. Greater number means further from decoratee - specify negative number to stay closer. Decorators without order (Order is 0) or with equal order are applied in registration order - first registered are closer decoratee.

member.name: P:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.UseDecorateeReuse
member.summary: Instructs to use decorated service reuse. Decorated service may be decorator itself.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates attribute by providing its optional properties.
member.param: (optional) Contract key of Decorated type, not for a decorator itself. Used to find the service to apply decorator to.

(optional)If provided specifies relative decorator position in decorators chain. Greater number means further from decoratee - specify negative number to stay closer. Decorators without order (Order is 0) or with equal order are applied in registration order - first registered are closer decoratee.
(optional) Instructs to use decorated service reuse. Decorated service may be decorator itself.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.AsDecoratorAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates attributes with and optional order.
member.param: (optional)
(optional)

member.summary: Simplified version of Push with most common properties.

member.summary: Returns all request until the root - parent is null.
member.returns: Requests from the last to first.

member.summary: Prints request with all its parents to string.

member.summary: Returns true if request info and passed object are equal, and their parents recursively are equal.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.Equals(DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo)
member.summary: Returns true if request info and passed info are equal, and their parents recursively are equal.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.EqualsWithoutParent(DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo)
member.summary: Compares with other info taking into account the properties but not the parents and their properties.
member.param: Info to compare for equality.

member.name: M:DryIocAttributes.RequestInfo.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns hash code combined from info fields plus its parent.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute
member.summary: Specifies to register annotated type in container. Or you could annotate Method with this attribute, and the method will be used as Factory Method for registration.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.ContractName
member.summary: Optional contract name to identify registered service when you are importing it.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.ContractType
member.summary: Optional service type to register with, if omitted then annotated implementation type will be used as service type. If specified it should be assignable from annotated type.

member.summary: Creates default attribute without and with annotated type as .

member.summary: Creates Export with specified , which should be assignable from annotated type.

member.summary: Creates Export with specified to identify service when imported.

member.summary: Creates Export with both and specified.

member.summary: Create default attribute without and with annotated type as .

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartNotDiscoverableAttribute
member.summary: Prevents annotated type from being exported, if its base type was marked with .

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy
member.summary: Specifies that exported type instance should be NonShared (created in each Import - aka Transient) or Shared (created once and then reused in each Import - aka Singleton).

member.name: F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any
member.summary: Default for compatibility with MEF .NET 4.5, in DryIoc means the same as .

member.name: F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared
member.summary: (default) Exported type instance will be created once and then reused in each Import - aka Singleton

member.name: F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared
member.summary: Exported type instance will be created in each Import - aka Transient.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies fro Exported type.

member.summary: Creation policy, Shared by default.

member.summary: Creates attribute.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportingConstructorAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that annotated constructor should be used for creating Exported type.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that for parameter, property or field should be injected with service instance identified by attribute settings. Import is not required for constructor parameters in Exported type: it is needed only if you want specify type different from parameter type. For properties and fields attribute is required, otherwise they won't be injected.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractName
member.summary: Optional, identifies Exported service with equal to be injected.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.ContractType
member.summary: Optional, identifies Exported service with equal to be injected. The specified type should be assignable to annotated parameter, property or field type.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.AllowDefault
member.summary: Allow default value for the member if corresponding Exported service was found. If not specified, then instead of default value Exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Creates default attribute. Required for property or field to be imported. May be omitted for parameters.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Import with matched . Type should assignable to annotated member.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Import with matched .

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Import with both matched and .

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.MetadataAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that annotated attribute should be used as metadata object associated with Export. You can create your won custom Export attribute with metadata by deriving from and annotating new attribute with .
